mapper.select: SELECT bi.BAKERY_NAME, bi2.IMG_NO , BI2.CHANGE_NAME , BI2.RESOURCES_PATH, bs.OPEN_TIME , bs.CLOSE_TIME FROM BAKERY_INFO bi JOIN BAKERY_IMAGE bi2 ON bi.BAKERY_NO = BI2.BAKERY_NO JOIN BAKERY_SCHEDULE bs ON bs.BAKERY_NO = BI.BAKERY_NO ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SUBSCRIBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE SUBSCRIBER SET SUBSCRIBE_YN = 'Y', SUBSCRIBE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBSCRIBER (SUBSCRIBER_NO, EMAIL, SUBSCRIBE_YN, SUBSCRIBE_DATE) VALUES (SUBSCRIBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, 'Y', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, TO_CHAR(SUBSCRIBE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SUBSCRIBE_DATE FROM SUBSCRIBER WHERE SUBSCRIBE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SUBSCRIBE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NEWSLETTER_SEND_LOG (LOG_ID, EMAIL, SEND_STATUS) VALUES (NEWSLETTER_SEND_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NEWSLETTER_SEND_LOG WHERE SEND_STATUS = 'SUCCESS'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NEWSLETTER_HISTORY ( HISTORY_NO, BAKERY_NAME, RESOURCES_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, OPEN_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, LOCATION, SENT_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_NEWSLETTER_HISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{bakeryName}, #{resourcesPath}, #{changeName}, #{openTime}, #{closeTime}, #{location}, SYSDATE )
